name: Dinner Tonight: Grilled Bok Choy With Spicy Vinaigrette
description: Wikimedia Commons I've been on a grilling kick recently and no wonder—with the weather in Chicago mostly nice and sunny except yesterday, I've been camping out on the stoop and grilling right on my sidewalk. (Is that even legal?)...
recipeIngredient: 1 head bok choy, thick stem removed and chopped into 2-inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the rice wine vinegar, chili paste, vegetable oil, scallion, and sesame seeds in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Grill the bok choy pieces either on a grill or on a grill pan over medium-high heat for about 3 to 4 minutes, turning every 30 seconds or so. They should get crisp, but not blacken.
When done throw the bok choy in the bowl with the vinaigrette. Mix together thoroughly and serve.
